livegrep

Fast, regular expression code search service
git clone https://source.static.kevinlin.info/external/livegrep.git
Log | Files | Refs | README | LICENSE

about.html (745B) (raw)

      1 {{template "layout" .}}
      2 
      3 {{define "body"}}
      4 <div class='textarea'>
      5   <p>
      6     This livegrep project was an experiment in scaling real-time
      7     regex search, inspired in part by the death of <a
      8     href="http://google.com/codesearch">Google Codesearch.</a>
      9   </p>
     10   <p>
     11     livegrep uses Russ Cox's excellent <a
     12     href="http://code.google.com/p/re2/">RE2</a> regular expression
     13     library, underneath a custom indexing and searching backend
     14     written in C++ with pthreads. The frontend is implemented in <a
     15     href="http://golang.org/">Go</a>.
     16   </p>
     17   <p>
     18     livegrep is written and run by <a
     19     href="https://nelhage.com/">Nelson Elhage</a> and is <a
     20     href="https://github.com/livegrep/livegrep">open source</a>.
     21   </p>
     22 </div>
     23 {{end}}
